originalTitle: 'Affront to humanity': Sudan slams Uganda for hosting RSF paramilitary boss
title: 'Affront to humanity': Sudan slams Uganda for hosting RSF paramilitary boss
content: Sudan accuses Uganda of flouting international law by meeting Rapid Support Forces boss Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo.

originalTitle: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
title: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
content: Days of competition culminate in a fishing contest rooted in efforts to cement local peace.

originalTitle: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
title: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
content: In a rare occurence, three soldiers were handed jail terms for killings in the troubled Anglophone region.

originalTitle: What will Trump’s latest sweeping tariffs mean for the world?
title: What will Trump’s latest sweeping tariffs mean for the world?
content: The US president has injected new uncertainty into the global economy with a 15 percent tariff on all imports.

originalTitle: Syria moves out last residents of ISIL-linked desert camp
title: Syria moves out last residents of ISIL-linked desert camp
content: Official Fadi al-Qassem says all residents have left al-Hol camp, which long housed relatives of alleged ISIL members.

originalTitle: The Carlson-Huckabee interview may be the wake-up call Americans needed
title: The Carlson-Huckabee interview may be the wake-up call Americans needed
content: The interview brought the 'Israel first vs America first' debate to heart of the American right.

originalTitle: Zelensky tells BBC Putin has started WW3 and must be stopped
title: Zelensky tells BBC Putin has started WW3 and must be stopped
content: Ukraine's president sat down with the BBC's Jeremy Bowen in Kyiv days before the four-year anniversary of the war.

originalTitle: Mexico's most wanted drug lord 'El Mencho' killed in military operation
title: Mexico's most wanted drug lord 'El Mencho' killed in military operation
content: Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes, known as "El Mencho", headed one of Mexico's most powerful drug cartels.

originalTitle: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
title: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
content: The suspect was carrying a shotgun and fuel can when he was killed, officers said. Trump was in Washington DC at the time.

originalTitle: Eze torments Spurs again as leaders Arsenal win north London derby
title: Eze torments Spurs again as leaders Arsenal win north London derby
content: Eberechi Eze torments Tottenham Hotspur again as Arsenal made a title statement of intent by restoring their lead at the top of the Premier League table to five points with victory in the north London derby.

originalTitle: Mac Allister scores added-time winner as Liverpool beat Forest
title: Mac Allister scores added-time winner as Liverpool beat Forest
content: Alexis Mac Allister scores a 97th-minute winner as Liverpool beat Nottingham Forest in a chaotic finish at the City Ground.

originalTitle: Jimenez scores twice as Fulham leapfrog Sunderland into top half of table
title: Jimenez scores twice as Fulham leapfrog Sunderland into top half of table
content: Raul Jimenez scores twice as Fulham end a run of three consecutive defeats, with a 3-1 win over Sunderland at the Stadium of Light in the Premier League.
